name: Inside the City Seams
description:
a late entry for #Flatjam 2016

a poetry collage map of times and memories alleyways happening around the corner, just out of sight.

alley memories & magic from 2016.

move with WASD

~~

Music is from Howdy Persephone's The Wild Hunt, used under a creative commons attribution license.

Content Notes: mentions of sex

This is the first game I have ever made?
